mapper.select: select ID,TITLE,CONTENT,MENU_ID,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,VERSION_ID from D_DOCUMENT where MENU_ID = #{menuId} and IS_VALID = 1
select ID,TITLE,CONTENT,MENU_ID,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,VERSION_ID from D_DOCUMENT where VERSION_ID = #{versionId} and IS_VALID = 1
mapper.insert: insert into D_DOCUMENT( TITLE, CONTENT, MENU_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION_ID ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{menuId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{versionId} )
mapper.update: update D_DOCUMENT set TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, VERSION_ID = #{versionId}, MENU_ID = #{menuId}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime} where ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: update D_DOCUMENT set IS_VALID = 0 where ID = #{id}
